attributes.action: Establish, by Act of Parliament, an independent body to oversee Forensic Sciences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create a body called "the Association of Forensic Sciences" whose responsibility would be to oversee all forensic sciences, both in the public and private sector, and utilising long standing principles established by the British Medical Association.  This would:

Improve the quality of forensic science.
Enforce standards of forensic science.

Reduce the cost to the judicial system by providing accredited independent experts to the court who clearly understand the role and responsibility of expert within English law.

Maintenance of the integrity of the association through the provision of a tribunal to call to account any member suspected of breaches.
